Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.address = ..Address.Value set proxy.city = ..City.ConvertToProxyObject()
set proxy.curator = ..Curator.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.fullName = ..FullName.Value set proxy.shortName = ..ShortName.Value set proxy.web = ..Web
set proxy.interns = ##class(%ListOfObjects).%New()
/*set key = "" for i=1:1:..Interns.Count(){ set key = ..Interns.Next(key) do proxy.interns.Insert(..Interns.GetAt(key).ConvertToProxyObject()) }*/
set proxy.employees = ##class(%ListOfObjects).%New() set key = "" for i=1:1:..Contacts.Count(){ do proxy.employees.Insert(..Contacts.GetAt(i).ConvertToProxyObject()) } quit proxy

UDLText.name: T
